Author: vicky#8212
Content: not chat gpt-specific, just general ai, but i thought this was super cool! canva (and adobe photoshop is releasing a beta version), but you can use their magic edit brush tool to ai-generate art to edit images! it's super cool i used it to fix my hair for a profile picture. couldn't find the og news article i found it from but heres a yt link: https://youtu.be/Fb9bniSgv-4

Author: vicky#8212
Content: sometimes it's pretty good, sometimes it leads to some questionable results, but in general it's fun. here is me asking it to change stuff in the picture of alex morgan. in the first one i asked it to change her shirt to one with her face on it, and in the other i asked it to turn her head into cake.

Author: azzzeret
Content: https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.08997 GPT-4 was given 4,550 novel questions representing the entire ‚ÄúMIT Mathematics and EECS undergraduate curriculum, including problem sets, midterms, and final exams.‚Äù These questions were not in the training data. Out of the box, GPT-4 scored 90%. With good prompts, it scored 100%.Good prompts included the technique of asking the AI ‚Äúto identify experts in the field, generate answers as if the experts wrote them, and combine the experts‚Äô answers by collaborative decision-making.‚Äù Pretty cool.

Author: profg

Author: profg
Content:
i've seen a lot of back-and-forth on this in the past 24 hours. 
my impression: this is legit.  
GPT's are not simply text-predictors; nor are they regurgitating pre-trained answers.
we have built a thinking machine.
(that said, there's _much_ more to be done, and people are quibbling about the details of how this experiment was set up -- it will be quaint to look back on this in 5 years)

Content:
imagine having a pre-training prompt that says you're a XXX student taking courses in XXX and you already know XXX, but you are trying to master XXX.  or, more localized version linking to a course syllabus and saying what week you are on, so that it can explain new things in familiar context. 
_this is absolutely huge_
